dc_title_s: Map of the city of Paterson, N.J., from surveys by city surveyor, J.H. Gotschius, C.E., 1871
dc_description_s: Map of Paterson, N.J. from Boyd's Paterson Directory containing personal notes, possibly by a surveyor|Source map supplied by New Jersey Department of Environmental Protection|Personal notes and manicule added regarding lots, etc.|Creases, stains and tears present, significant condition issues|Logo of Boyd's Directory Corps and label of of 'Boyd's Paterson Directory' are printed in upper left corner.
